ProblemStatement.p: A company wants to name a new product. Marketing department determined, that a name for a product is appropriate, if:

ol.li: it consist of exactly $N$ small English letters;
it has alternating vowels and consonants;
it does not contain any of given $M$ offensive substrings.

ProblemStatement.p: Your program must calculate the number of possible appropriate names. Note that English vowels are: 'a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'y'.

InputFormat.p: First line of input file contains two integers $N M$~--- name length and number of offensive substrings.
Following $M$ lines contain offensive substrings $s_i$, one per line.

OutputFormat.p: Output file must contain a single integer~--- number of appropriate names.
